Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.template.Template
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Layout

    public class Template
extends Object
implements Renderable, Assignable
    Template class which encapsulates Freemarker.

    Sven Strittmatter

        public void addPostFilter(Filter filter)
